snippet: The justice minister ordered political groups to obtain permission to meet with foreign diplomats, a move apparently aimed at further limiting Shiite opposition groups.
abstract: Bahrain's justice minister orders political groups to obtain permission to meet with foreign diplomats, move apparently aimed at further limiting Shiite opposition groups challenging Sunni monarchy.
lead_paragraph: The justice minister ordered political groups to obtain permission to meet with foreign diplomats, a move apparently aimed at further limiting Shiite opposition groups.
